為着: (しきせ) - livery; servant's clothes provided by employers
為続ける: (しつづける) - to continue to do; to persist in doing
為腐る: (しくさる) - to do (indicating contempt for other person's actions)
為落す: (しおとす) - to fail to do; to make light of; to neglect
為落とす: (しおとす) - to fail to do; to make light of; to neglect
為遂げる: (しとげる) - to accomplish; to finish; to fulfill
為過ぎる: (しすぎる) - to overdo; to do too much
為難い: (しがたい) - (suru verb ending) hard to do
烈しい: (はげしい) - violent/furious/tempestuous; extreme/intense/fierce; fervent/vehement; incessant/relentless; precipitous/steep
烈しい競争: (はげしいきょうそう) - intense competition; hot competition
烈婦: (れっぷ) - chaste, strong-minded woman; virtuous woman; heroine
烈日: (れつじつ) - blazing sun; scorching sun; hot day
烏の濡れ羽色: (からすのぬればいろ) - glossy black (hair); color of a crow with wet feathers
烏の行水: (からすのぎょうずい) - quick bath
烏伝神道: (うでんしんとう) - Uden Shinto (Shinto doctrines enunciated by Kamo no Norikiyo of Kamigamo Shrine)
烏兎: (うと) - sun and moon; time/the years/the months
烏兎匆々: (うとそうそう) - (yoji) days and nights passing by quickly; months and years flying by; Time flies
烏兎匆匆: (うとそうそう) - (yoji) days and nights passing by quickly; months and years flying by; Time flies
烏合の衆: (うごうのしゅう) - disorderly crowd; mob
烏帽子: (えぼし) - black-lacquered headgear (made of silk, cloth or paper) originally worn by court nobles in ancient Japan, and afterwards spreading to the common people
烏帽子鳥: (エボシドリ) - turaco (any bird of family Musophagidae, esp. the Knysna turaco, Tauraco corythaix); touraco; loerie; lourie
烏座: (からすざ) - {astron} Corvus (constellation); the Crow; the Raven
烏揚羽: (カラスアゲハ) - Chinese peacock (species of swallowtail butterfly, Papilio bianor)
烏有に帰す: (うゆうにきす) - to be burned to ashes; to come to nothing
烏有に帰する: (うゆうにきする) - to be reduced to ashes
烏枢沙摩明王: (うすしゃまみょうおう) - Ucchusma
烏滸: (おこ) - foolish thing; stupid thing; absurdity
烏滸がましい: (おこがましい) - presumptuous; impertinent; ridiculous; absurd
烏滸の沙汰: (おこのさた) - stupidity; absurdity; presumption; impertinence
烏焉魯魚: (うえんろぎょ) - miswriting a word; using the wrong kanji to write a word
烏犀帯: (うさいたい) - type of leather belt worn with ceremonial court dress and decorated with a rhinoceros horn
烏瓜: (カラスウリ) - Japanese snake gourd (Trichosanthes cucumeroides)
烏羽玉: (ウバタマ) - jet black/pitch dark; peyote (Lophophora williamsii)/mescaline
烏芻沙摩明王: (うすしゃまみょうおう) - Ucchusma
烏蒭沙摩明王: (うすしゃまみょうおう) - Ucchusma
烏貝: (カラスガイ) - cockscomb pearl mussel (Cristaria plicata)
烏野豌豆: (からすのえんどう) - vetch; tare
烏金: (からすがね) - money lent at daily interest
烏鳩: (カラスバト) - Japanese wood pigeon (Columba janthina); black wood pigeon
烏鳴き: (からすなき) - cry of the crow
烏鷺: (うろ) - crows and herons; black and white
烏鷺の争い: (うろのあらそい) - game of go; playing go
烏麦: (エンバク) - wild oat (Avena fatua)/wild oats; (esp. 燕麦) oat (Avena sativa)/oats
烙印: (らくいん) - mark; brand; stigma; branding iron
烙印を押される: (らくいんをおされる) - to be branded a ...; to be labelled a ...
烝民: (じょうみん) - the masses; the people
